entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Webassembly size and performance #91437
  • [8.0] [Long Running Test] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CESchedulerPairTests.TestCompletionTask #91434
    8.0.0
  • Provide an implementation of `ReadOnlySpan<Rune>.ToString` #91426
  • Update config binding gen nupkg transitive build target to use granular interceptor opt-in #91419
    8.0.0
  • EventLogger ignores provided EventLogSettings.SourceName #91418
  • .NET7.0: Suppress CA1416 when wrapped in UIDevice.CheckSystemVersion #91412
  • AuthenticateAsClientAsync can fail if renegotiation is requested immediately after handshake #91409
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Hash and HMAC one-shots for HashAlgorithName #91407
    9.0.0
  • TaskAsyncEnumerableExtensions.WithCancellation does not override a cancelled token with an active one. #91397
  • [Mono] Add missing SIMD support for some methods from System.Numerics.Vector2/3/4 on Arm64 #91394
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Reenable disabled x86 SIMD unit tests #91392
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Hot-reload support on browser #91389
    9.0.0
  • [Android][Test] Interop test: Native libraries are missing or incorrectly packaged in the app #91388
    9.0.0
  • Emit custom modifiers into native layout metadata #91381
    9.0.0
  • Config generator overwrites existing properties when provided with empty config section #91380
    8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove StringContent special case #91379
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 Preview sending email exception #91377
    8.0.0
  • C# ADO.NET Transaction Scope Auto Committed Before Calling Complete() #91376
  • [linux-arm64] System.Net.Sockets crashes on AWS Gravitron3 with 7.0.400 SDK #91386
  • corerun with valgrind massif cause a crash #91370
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakesPeeks_ForceContentionWithOtherThreadsPeeking(seconds: 1) #91368
  • Possible Issue With Dependency Injection Container Service Resolution #91366

Closed

  • JSMarshalAsAttribute failing error tests #91410
    9.0.0
  • Visual Basic late binding failure on COM objects #90541
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo at MS.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical #86354
    Future
  • [Mono] Regression: amd64 AOT: condition `class1 != ARG_CLASS_NO_CLASS' not met #90955
    8.0.0
  • Reading a file in with StreamReader and writing it out with StreamWriter unconditionally adds a BOM when encoding detection is enabled #91362
  • Internal CLR error (0x80131506) when running IBC collection #90962
    9.0.0
  • dotnet.exe: Need a specific error message when running a .dll of the wrong bitness #85691
    9.0.0
  • [nodejs] bad option: --experimental-wasm-simd #91318
    8.0.0
  • .NET SDK on Ubuntu 18.04.6 libnethost.a contains inexisting libstdc++ symbol #91067
  • ReadItemAsync 'Hangs' in .Net 8.0, but works in .Net 7.0 #90943
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Specify default value for OrDefault Linq Methods #91396
  • Constructor function of System.IO.FileInfo won't throw other exceptions? #91369
  • Clang LLVM emitting float instrinsics for bitwise operation for every input #74661
    Future
  • [Mono] Re-enable hardware intrinsics tests when LLVM JIT is enabled for llvmaot lanes #75767
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Upgrade LLVM-JIT to ver. 14 #75757
    Future
  • Make Sure LLVM Zero Extends Word in JIT Mode #75712
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!(checkUnusedValues && def->IsUnusedValue()) && "operands should never be marked as unused values"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91273
    8.0.0
  • NativeLib is ignored without PublishAot #91353
    Future
  • we are embeding mono with ue how can we disable reload satellite assembly(*.resource.dll)? #90010
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Please reinstate CustomMarshalers.TypeToTypeInfoMarshaler for COM #91307
    Future
  • C# Dapper Transaction Scope is not rollbacking for DB2 Provider #91326
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.SEHException blocking runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect pipeline #90947
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91436
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91433
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Options Source Gen Fixes #91432
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91424
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91422
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.x
  • [NO MERGE] Bump mono to -std=gnu11 #91421
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91417
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use SequenceEqual in BigInteger.Equals #91416
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.Bcl.Numerics.Tests: fix restore failure when DotNetBuildFromSource. #91402
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [nodejs] Remove experimental wasm arguments from template #91401
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Support for DivRem intrinsic on x86-64. #91393
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Prevent other threads from writing to a session once rundown begins #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix LDTOKEN of methods that have modifiers #91382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix runtime dispatch to static virtuals on interface types #91374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #91373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Allow superpmi.exe to find a default JIT #91371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove libraries_tests PMI collection #91365
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix arm64/arm32 cross-DAC #91425
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update 6.0 branch to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90762
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Update 7.0 to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90767
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.23 #91404
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.12 #91405
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Options Source Gen Fixes #91363
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91399
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 9.0.0
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo #91024
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91352
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix nullable annotation for Validator.TryValidateValue and ValidateValue #91293
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91359
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Test hot/cold splitting in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 pipeline #91217
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91292
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove some manual test scaffolding #89653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add error message for loading assembly with incompatible architecture #91289
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add link to docs to interop error messages #91328
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 9.0.0
  • Revert "[wasm] Add link to docs to interop error messages" #91408
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • new synchronization mechanism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [nodejs] Remove experimental wasm arguments from template #91384
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use live illink to trim framework #91233
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add blazor startup measurements to browser-bench #91199
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91247
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Remove DirectoryInfo.ToString() from ref assembly #91354
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Print message arguments in forwarded console #91315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2256435 #91360
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on Arm64 #91225
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix arm64/arm32 cross-DAC #91438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Fix impNonConstFallback #91345
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix allocation in DateTime.TryParse when it returns false #91303
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove FEATURE_BASICFREEZE #91132
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [ARM64] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #91342
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser

    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation

    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, regression-from-last-release, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] [wasm] Request Streaming upload #91295
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0

    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement

    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0

    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
